response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value for me. I understand that the true worth of this item may be subjective and varies from person to person. Therefore, I am extending an offer to purchase this product for $750,000. This amount reflects my personal valuation and the significant investment made in acquiring it. I believe this offer presents a fair compromise that respects both the intrinsic value of the product and your potential interest in it. I look forward to discussing this further with you.", "product_price": 750000}
